title: Patch Notes
content: quest. Fixed a bug preventing the 'Steal the Sacred Idol' quest from closing when you leave Act I. Made it possible to finish Helsik's quest if you manage to steal the gauntlets from the House of Hope and avoid Raphael's wrath. The 'Free Lae'zel' quest will correctly update if Lae'zel is sent directly to camp during her recruitment scene in the cage.
